name: greeter-service
description: Greets anyone making an API call, also offers the capability to add new greetings.

scripts.build: npm i && mkdir -p build && aws cloudformation package --template-file infrastructure.yaml --output-template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --s3-bucket foobarfizzbuzz
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/infrastructure.packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name greeter-service-fizzbuzz --parameter-overrides Environment=development
